criticalSuccess.message: Choose two of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Amiri has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Amiri’s personal biases, one of Amiri’s resistances, or one of Amiri’s weaknesses. you can choose the same option twice to learn two pieces of information from the same category.

success.message: Choose one of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Amiri has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Amiri’s personal biases, one of Amiri’s resistances, or one of Amiri’s weaknesses.

criticalFailure.message: Choose a piece of information to learn about, as success, but the information is incorrect. For instance, you might think Amiri is susceptible to flattery when actually Amiri is resistant to flattery.
